publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4042 Patricia Ferguson: Architecture—That the Parliament appreciates the importance of architecture to many aspects of life in Scotland; recognises its vital role in delivering successful places and sustainable regeneration; acknowledges the wide range of progress that has been made to date in implementing the commitments of the Scottish Executive’s policy on architecture, and supports the Executive’s intention to publish a renewed policy statement this year. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe*
